analysis.key_quote: Without protections requiring firing for cause, at-will employees status will allow political appointees to create pretext or no reason at all to fire people with disabilities protected by the Americans with Disabilities Act and people giving or receiving care protected by the Family Medical Leave Act.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern about the lack of due process protections for employees, particularly those with disabilities and caregivers, indicating opposition to the proposed rule. It also raises issues of potential politicization in the firing process, further aligning with an anti-rule stance.
